title: {websiteName} Terms of Service
subtitle: Rules and agreements for using our open-source research platform

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using {websiteName}, you agree to these Terms of Service. These terms govern your access to our browser-based database for archaeological and historical data. Non-compliance may result in account suspension.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
sections.content: Users must provide accurate information during registration and data submission. You are responsible for maintaining account security. Misuse of {websiteName}â€™s tools violates these terms.

sections.title: Data Licensing
sections.content: Data submitted to {websiteName} is shared under open licenses per FAIR principles. Users must respect these licenses when using or redistributing data. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

sections.title: Platform Usage
sections.content: {websiteName} is for research and educational purposes. Commercial use requires prior approval. Users must comply with CIDOC-CRM standards for data submissions.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: {websiteName} may terminate accounts for violating these terms. Users can request account deletion. Terminated accounts lose access to submitted data and platform features.
